page.title: 17MEDICAL CARE - TYDD ST.GILES
page.content: In Tydd St. Giles there is no hospital or doctor's surgery.If you need a doctor you go to Wisbech, Long Sutton or Sutton Bridge. Mine is at Wisbech.The North Cambs Hospital in Wisbech is the nearest hospital. There is a new hospital called the Queen Elizabeth Hospital in Kings Lynn. The health visitor comes to school twice a year.The health visitors come to different schools.The name of our health visitor is Mrs.Pallant.The health visitor checks your eyes and ears. The school doctor and the dentist come to the school once a year. We don't have any chemist shops to sell medicine but we do have a post office which sells some kind of tablets. Sometimes when people are having a baby the doctors come to them.
